channel.title: What's This Movie Really About?
channel.itunes:subtitle: What are modern movies teaching these days? Join Sable and Dave as they explore the morality -- or Cine-morality - of today’s films, both old and new, on What’s This Movie REALLY About?

item.itunes:title: What's The Yankles Really About?
item.title: What's The Yankles Really About?
item.itunes:author: Sable and Dave
item.itunes:subtitle: The WTMRA Archive Feed
item.description: Sable and Dave sit down with Zev Brooks to talk about the hit film “The Yankles”, co-written with his brother David, who also directed the picture. Find out if Sable and Dave’s theories about what the Yankles is REALLY about are correct as they go straight to the writer to get the answers to that …
item.content:encoded: Sable and Dave sit down with Zev Brooks to talk about the hit film “The Yankles”, co-written with his brother David, who also directed the picture. Find out if Sable and Dave’s theories about what the Yankles is REALLY about are correct as they go straight to the writer to get the answers to that …"

item.itunes:title: What's Gravity Really About?
item.title: What's Gravity Really About?
item.itunes:author: Sable and Dave
item.itunes:subtitle: The WTMRA Archive Feed
item.description: What’s GRAVITY Really About? Well, good writers know that their hero has a problem, and the adventure they get is the one they need, even if they want nothing to do with it. Join Sable and Dave as they unravel GRAVITY and figure out why Ryan Stone must go through this harrowing adventure.
item.content:encoded: What’s GRAVITY Really About? Well, good writers know that their hero has a problem, and the adventure they get is the one they need, even if they want nothing to do with it. Join Sable and Dave as they unravel GRAVITY and figure out why Ryan Stone must go through this harrowing adventure.

item.itunes:title: What's Fearless Really About?
item.title: What's Fearless Really About?
item.itunes:author: Sable and Dave
item.itunes:subtitle: The WTMRA Archive Feed
item.itunes:summary: What's Fearless Really About? With Screenwriter Rafael Yglesias
item.description: Sable and Dave have a real treat for you in this episode. They interview the novelist, screenwriter, autodidact, and baller Rafael Yglesias about his 1993 film Fearless, starring Jeff Bridges, and directed by Peter Weir. Rafael shares the personal inspiration behind his novel Fearless and how it came to be the film that it is.
item.content:encoded: Sable and Dave have a real treat for you in this episode. They interview the novelist, screenwriter, autodidact, and baller Rafael Yglesias about his 1993 film Fearless, starring Jeff Bridges, and directed by Peter Weir. Rafael shares the personal inspiration behind his novel Fearless and how it came to be the film that it is.

item.itunes:subtitle: The WTMRA Archive Feed
item.itunes:summary: What’s National Treasure Really About? With Guests Lawrence Riggins and Chessie Reiss
item.description: Hidden meanings in a movie about hidden treasure. Lawrence Riggins (writer-director) unearths nuggets and gems buried within this underrated treasure of a film.
item.content:encoded: Hidden meanings in a movie about hidden treasure. Lawrence Riggins (writer-director) unearths nuggets and gems buried within this underrated treasure of a film.

item.itunes:title: What’s Ghostbusters Really About? Business? Government? Sex? Evil spirits destroying the world? With guest Lawrence Riggins.
item.title: What’s Ghostbusters Really About? Business? Government? Sex? Evil spirits destroying the world? With guest Lawrence Riggins.
item.itunes:author: Sable and Dave
item.itunes:subtitle: The WTMRA Archive Feed
item.itunes:summary: What’s Ghostbusters Really About? Business? Government? Sex? Evil spirits destroying the world? With guest Lawrence Riggins.
item.description: Professor Lawrence Riggins (writer, director) joins Dave Smith and Sable Cantus for this riveting episode about the 1984 classic Ghostbusters. “Listen! Do you smell something?” Interested in screenwriting? Attend an eight week screenwriting course in beautiful Huntington Beach, CA. Email Chessie at chessirose82515@gmail.com for more information. Tell us what you think on Twitter and Facebook. “Where do those stairs … Continue reading "What’s Ghostbusters Really About? Business? Government? Sex? Evil spirits destroying the world? With guest Lawrence Riggins."
item.content:encoded: Professor Lawrence Riggins (writer, director) joins Dave Smith and Sable Cantus for this riveting episode about the 1984 classic Ghostbusters. “Listen! Do you smell something?” Interested in screenwriting? Attend an eight week screenwriting course in beautiful Huntington Beach, CA. Email Chessie at chessirose82515@gmail.com for more information. item.title: What’s Get Out Really About?
item.itunes:author: Sable and Dave
item.itunes:subtitle: The WTMRA Archive Feed
item.description: Slavery, racism, teaspoons … Join Sable and Dave as they discuss how these things figure into Jordan Peele’s masterful suspense/thriller, Get Out.
item.content:encoded: Slavery, racism, teaspoons … Join Sable and Dave as they discuss how these things figure into Jordan Peele’s masterful suspense/thriller, Get Out.

item.itunes:title: What’s PT Anderson’s Magnolia Really About? With Guest Chessie Reiss (MFA)
item.title: What’s PT Anderson’s Magnolia Really About? With Guest Chessie Reiss (MFA)
item.itunes:author: Sable and Dave
item.itunes:subtitle: The WTMRA Archive Feed
item.itunes:summary: What’s PT Anderson’s Magnolia Really About? With Guest Chessie Reiss (MFA)
item.description: Fathers, Film, and Frogs. Join Sable, Dave and Chessie for an animated and in depth review of the PT Anderson film, Magnolia, Chessie fails to convince Sable that this is a great movie. Dave threatens the actual MFA paper … Listen in to find out what happens in this EPIC podcast.
item.content:encoded: Fathers, Film, and Frogs. Join Sable, Dave and Chessie for an animated and in depth review of the PT Anderson film, Magnolia, Chessie fails to convince Sable that this is a great movie. Dave threatens the actual MFA paper … Listen in to find out what happens in this EPIC podcast.
